org.rapla.mobile.android.browser.integration

Interface BrowserIntentHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReservationEditIntentHandler

    public interface BrowserIntentHandler
    This interface is used to dynamically handle an intent from the browser.
    Author:
    Maximilian Lenkeit

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleIntent(Context context, RaplaMobileApplication application, Intent intent, org.rapla.framework.RaplaContext raplaContext)
      Handle the requested action
      boolean matches(Uri data)
      Check whether this handler class can handle the uri

    • Method Detail

      • matches

        boolean matches(Uri data)
        Check whether this handler class can handle the uri
        Parameters:
        data - Uri instance from intent
        Returns:
        True if the handler matches the uri data, false otherwise

                RaplaMobileApplication application,
                Intent intent,
                org.rapla.framework.RaplaContext raplaContext)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Handle the requested action
        Parameters:
        context - The current context
        application - Reference to the custom application
        intent - The received intent
        raplaContext - The current rapla context
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If anything unexpected happens
